Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to deliver unparalleled performance and value. This product is not just an item; it's an investment in excellence. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, I'm offering it to you at an exclusive price of $15000. This opportunity won't come again, so I hope you'll consider this generous offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
